## Installation :

```sh
$ npm install adc.js
```
## Example :
```sh
var adc  = require('adc.js');

var data = ["a","c",1,"d","d","a",2,2,"f","f","d",1,"a",2];
var test = new adc(data).count();
console.log(test);

// -> will print {'1': 2, '2': 3, a: 3, c: 1, d: 3, f: 2}.
```
